hackathon-description-text: Consensys is hosting its first ever Ethereal Hackathon in partnership with UC Berkeley blockchain club! This is a one-of-a-kind experience that will not only expose attendees to the potential of Ethereum but also allow for in-depth exploration as self assembled teams partner with industry professionals providing mentorship throughout the competition.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The sole winning team will receive 5k in Ether.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=2222 Piedmont Ave, Berkeley, CA 94720, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Must be Ethereum related, in particular governance and have some working code.
